about_the_game:
Under the Map is a multiplayer Horror Survival game based on the backroom-style lore featured among the popular YouTube trend. Featuring lore with multiple levels of the backrooms and minigames.

What makes us stand out?
- Immersive experience (This game uses the latest Unreal Engine 5.4 technology with top level graphical and lighting software such as lumen, almost never seen before in other horror games!)

- Good for our budget we spent (The team working on this have years of experience and have used the latest and up do date technology in Unreal Engine 5 to get what we have to offer!)

- The backrooms style (This isn't just another backroom game with 1 level and minimal development, we have multiple levels and minigames added with hundreds of hours spent on the development and have done everything efficiently. We are not in this for the sole purpose of profit.

- Various updates (We are working on ensuring that over months there will be frequent level updates and new minigames for people to explore and enjoy)

- 2 Game modes on release:

- Entity VS Human (unseen in any backrooms game this allows you to play as the entities with your friends using the levels created and different maps you will have the opportunity to use your ability to attack the humans and they will also have the ability to counter, maps for this include the original backrooms layout with endless halls and our supermarket level which let's you hide in the freezers and other places and much more. What are you waiting for give us a try!)

- Open world level (Also unseen in any backrooms game have you ever wanted to explore the levels with your friends without having to load between levels? Well with this game mode you are given the opportunity to explore endlessly and feel immersive like you are actually there similar to how some open world short animations of the backrooms look on youtube.)


Introduction:
You glitch into the very reality of life and wake up in a mysterious-thrilling looking area, you have no idea where or how you got here but you take the elevator to another level which then things go from bad to worse. An entity with this creepy smile appears, you run for your life and run through a door hoping this "thing" doesn't attack you. In going through the door you enter this mono-yellow area with endless objects around you. But that entity is there too, should you make it through the level you will find it is almost endless with levels upon levels. Will you explore it alone or with your friends? Is the Government involved? Will you ever get out? Play through the levels and find out!

Features
- Immersive Experience (We have jump scares for each individual entity along with the best and latest detail to fit a horror game)
- Minigames
- Inventory system with workable objects
- Horror-style environment
- Multiple levels
- hours of gameplay
- Repetitive levels (procedural levels may be coming in the future)
- Multiplayer!
- THIS IS NOT A WALKING SIMULATOR! We want people to know we are committed and will do our best to ensure ultimate gameplay rather then continuous walking
